tags.name: Security
tags.description: When you sign up for an account, MobiledgeX admin will unlock your account and you part of an organization. To access the APIs you must login first and then use the generated token to access authorized APIs. MobiledgeX uses JSON Web Tokens for authentication. JWT is a short lifetime tokens that can be assigned a specific expiration time. Never share your secret keys. Keep them guarded and secure

tags.name: User
tags.description: User belongs to an organization and can access operator/cloudlet APIs

tags.name: Organization
tags.description: Organization is a group whose members can access operator/cloudlet APIs

tags.name: Cloudlet
tags.description: Cloudlet is a set of compute resources at a particular location, provided by an Operator

tags.name: ClusterInst
tags.description: ClusterInst is an instance of a Cluster on a Cloudlet. It is defined by a Cluster, Cloudlet, and Developer key

tags.name: App
tags.description: App belongs to developers and is used to provide information about their application

tags.name: AppInst
tags.description: AppInst is an instance of an App on a Cloudlet where it is defined by an App plus a ClusterInst key
